ComicInfo.Title: Hidden Human History
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Thirteenth Doctor continues her second comic adventure under the pen of Eisner Award nominee Jody Houser (Mother Panic, Stranger Things, Star Wars, Faith, Spider-Man: Renew Your Vows)! Gorgeous art from Rachael Stott, Giorgia Sposito, and Eren Enrica Angiolini sends fans old and new on fresh adventures through time and space!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Sanya Anwar | 1 | B | Cover B | Photo | 2 | C | Cover C | Rachael Smith | 3 |
